paymentInfoDescription: Evebox will transfer ticket sales to your account. Ticket sales (after deducting service fees for Evebox) will be credited to your account after confirming the sale report within 7 - 10 days.

email1: - Starts with a letter, number, or one of the characters . _ % + -
email3: - After '@' is the domain, which may include letters, numbers, dots (.) or hyphens (-)
email4: - Ends with a dot followed by at least two letters (e.g., .com, .vn)
phone3: - Total length must be 10 or 11 digits

oneTimeAnswerPerOrder: Buyers will only need to answer all questions once per order

noPaymentInfo: You haven't registered payment info as an organizer yet
requestPlaceholder: For ex: Create a catchy HTML description with at least 2 images...
continueBooking: You were in the process of purchasing a ticket earlier. Would you like to continue the ticket purchase process?
registerTicketSuccess: You have registered successfully! Direct to Ticket Management page for more details
selectStartEndTime: Please choose the start and end time
sessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue using the application.
sessionExpiredNote: Your entered data will be preserved after logging in
updateNeedReview: Your update need to be reviewed because:
updateWillWaitApproval: If you continue, your event will be updated and has to wait for the next approval.
noTicketsMatch: No tickets match the search keyword
searchByNameOrOrderId: Search by name or order ID
giftTicketFor: Enter the recipient's email to gift this ticket
giftReceiveExpired: Sorry, errors happened in receiving process. Please contact the organizer for assistance.
searchByEventOrOrg: Find by event title or organizer name
eventNotFoundDesc: Your event has no showings. Please check again.
receivingProcessingNotice: The system is processing your request, please wait a moment...
checkTicketAndQR: Check ticket and QR Code (mobile app)
viewDetailInstruction: Select an item to see detailed instructions here.
toSignUpAccount: To create an account, the user navigates to the “Sign Up” page and completes the required fields: full name, email address, phone number, and password.
systemSendsVerificationEmail: The system will send a verification email to complete the process.
signInMethods: You can sign in with your registered email account or use the quick sign-in method via Google.
accessAccountManagementInstruction: After signing in, access 'Account Management' by opening the sidebar and clicking the 'Account Management' button, or by clicking your username in the top right corner.
defaultProfileTabInstruction: By default, you will be on the 'Personal Information' tab, where you can view and edit your full name, phone number, and profile picture.
updateAvatarInstruction: When updating your profile picture, you can select 'Upload Image' to upload a photo from your computer or 'Choose from uploaded photos' to select a previously uploaded image.
changePasswordInstruction: In the sidebar, click the 'Change Password' button to set a new password after verifying your old one.
useSearchBarInstruction: Use the search bar on the homepage to find events by name or keyword.
useAdvancedFiltersInstruction: Use advanced filters to search by category (music, workshops...), location, date range, and ticket price.
clickAIChatbotIconInstruction: Click the AI Chatbot icon on the interface.
aiChatbotUsageInstruction: You can choose from the system's predefined options or type questions in natural language to find events (e.g., 'Find music events in Da Lat'). The chatbot will analyze your request and return matching results.
enterNaturalLanguageQuery: Enter your request in natural language:
addToFavoritesInstruction: On an event or organizer's detail page, click the 'Heart' icon to add it to your favorites. You can also quickly add events from the homepage by clicking the heart icon.
viewFavoritesInstruction: Go to 'Account' -> 'Favorites List' to review your saved items and manage notifications.
selectShowingInstruction: On the event details page, select a suitable showing.
selectTicketTypeAndQuantity: Choose the ticket type and quantity. If the event has a seat map, you can directly select your desired seats.
ticketHoldInstruction: The system will hold your tickets for 20 minutes. Proceed to fill out the information form (if any) and move to the payment step.
selectPaymentMethod: Choose the payment method via PayOS and complete the transaction.
redirectToPayOS: The system will redirect you to the PayOS page to scan the payment QR code.
paymentSuccessInstruction: After a successful payment, the system will send a confirmation email with an e-ticket containing a QR code, and then redirect you to the successful payment page.
manageTicketsInstruction: In the sidebar, click the 'Manage Tickets' button to go to the list of purchased tickets.
viewPurchasedTicketsInstruction: Displays a list of purchased tickets. You can search by event, filter by ticket status (All, Successful, Processing, Canceled), or by event time (Upcoming, Past).
viewTicketDetails: Click on a ticket to view the detailed information of your purchase.
viewQRMobilInstruction: View QR Code (for the mobile app).
createEventSidebarButton: After successfully logging in, click 'Create Event' in the sidebar.
organizerInfoPopup: A popup with the message 'You have not registered payment information as an organizer' will appear with two options: 'Continue to create event' or 'Register as an organizer'.
ifSelectRegisterOrganizer: If you choose 'Register as an organizer', a form 'Register as an Organizer' will be displayed for payment information (Account Holder, Account Number...).
afterRegisterOrganizer: After filling in all information and clicking 'Confirm', you will be redirected to the 'Create Event' page where you can create paid or free tickets, depending on your purpose.
ifContinueCreatingEvent: If you choose 'Continue to create event', you will be redirected to the 'Create Event' page. A 'Note on publishing events' popup will appear by default (can be closed), and here you can only create free tickets.
aiDescriptionSuggestion: When you fill in all the required information in Step 1 - 'Event Information', the 'Agree' button for the AI Event Description Suggestion will be enabled. You can add 'Your request (optional)' and click 'Agree' to auto-generate the 'Event Information'.
saveOrContinueStep1: Once all required information in Step 1 is filled, you can click 'Continue' to proceed to Step 2 or 'Save' to save it as a draft for later editing.
createTicketTypeInstruction: You must select the event's 'Start time' and 'End time' to 'Create Ticket Type'. Click 'Create New Ticket Type' to show the 'Create New Ticket' popup.
fillInfoAndSave: Fill in the information completely and click 'Save'.
newTicketDisplayed: The newly created ticket will be displayed. You can also filter the event schedule by 'Month'.
editOrDeleteTicket: For a created ticket, you can edit it by clicking the 'Pencil' icon or delete it by clicking the 'Trash' icon.
deleteConfirmation: For the 'Delete' action, a confirmation popup 'Do you want to delete this ticket?' will appear. Click 'OK' to proceed with the deletion.
createAnotherShowing: Click 'Create Showing' to create another session for the event.
copyTicketTypeInstruction: A new showing is created. Here, after entering a valid 'Start time' and 'End time', you can use the 'Copy Ticket Types' feature.
copyTicketTypePopup: The 'Copy Ticket Types' popup appears when you click the button.
continueToStep3: Similar to Step 1, after entering valid information, click 'Continue' to proceed to Step 3.
registrationFormPage: The 'Registration Information' page allows you to create a form or select from existing templates (or previously created forms) after clicking 'Continue' in Step 2.
filterAndSelectForm: You can filter 'Created Forms', then select one and click 'Continue' to complete the event creation flow.
orCreateNewForm: Alternatively, you can create a new form by clicking the 'Create New Form' button.
eventCreatedPendingApproval: After clicking 'Continue', a popup will appear notifying you that the event has been created successfully and is pending approval.
redirectToMyEvents: You will be redirected to the 'My Events' page after clicking 'Got it'.
manageEventsByStatus: You can manage your events under three status tabs: 'Upcoming / Past / Pending'.
clickEditToModify: Click 'Edit' to modify the event information.
redirectToCreateEventPage: You will be redirected back to the 'Create Event' page to edit the event.
clickOverviewForReport: Click 'Overview' to see the event's summary report.
clickMembersToView: Click 'Members' to see the details of the event's organizing team.
clickOrdersToView: Click 'Orders' to see the successful or canceled ticket orders for the event.
mobileOpsAndStatsTitle: Operations and Statistics (on the mobile app)
viewRevenueAndTicketsSold: View revenue and number of tickets sold.
revenueManagementNote: Manage the revenue of the application, organizers, and events.
clickAndDrag: Click drag or use two fingers on touchpad
zoomTip: Zoom in to see seat number and position clearly
